```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}

ts <- seq(as.POSIXct("1970-01-01", tz = "UTC"),
    as.POSIXct("1970-01-02", tz = "UTC"),
    by = "min")
ts <- ts[-1441]

data_frame <- data.frame(est = unlist(acth_long_G[4,4:1443]),
                         time = ts)



ggplot(data_frame, aes(x = time, y = est)) +
    geom_line() +
    scale_x_datetime(breaks = breaks_width("4 hour"),date_labels = "%H:%M") +
    ggtitle("Activity by Time") +
  xlab("Time") +
  ylab("Activity (MIMS)") +
  theme_bw()

ggsave(filename = "SampleActivty.jpg",height = 2, width = 5)

```
